extension_name.message: Cuckoo - Log Google Meet Chat Messages

extension_description.message: Transmit chat messages on Google Meet to a Slack channel automatically

slack_bot_token_description.message: How to create a Slack bot, and generate a Slack bot token

slack_bot_token_scopes_description.message: "chat:write" is required for this bot token

slack_bot_to_channel_description.message: Please add this bot to a channel to which you want to post

slack_user_id_description.message: How to find a Slack user ID
